details.description: Find a register office (registry office) -  register births, marriages, civil partnerships and deaths and order certificates
details.introduction: Find records of births, marriages, civil partnerships and deaths. You can order copies of certificates and search records to trace your family tree.

tags.title: Certificates, register offices, changes of name or gender

details.description: Includes researching family history, deed poll changes, correcting certificates
Includes civil partnerships, splitting up and Lasting Power of Attorney
How to get married or enter a civil partnership in England and Wales, giving notice of marriage at a register office, paying fees and getting married abroad

related.title: Order a copy of a birth, death or marriage certificate

details.description: Order an official birth, marriage or death certificate from the General Register Office (GRO) if you need a copy or want to research your family tree

related.title: What to do after someone dies

details.description: The steps you must take after a death - register a death, report a death with Tell Us Once, coroners, funerals and death abroad
Parents must register their child's birth within 42 days - who can register, birth certificates, registering a birth abroad
Explore the local archives to help your research into family and local history at your local council
